name: Haus of Irndrous
storyline: Haus Of Irndrous is a horror game set in the 80s. Counting with a limited stamina and a flashlight that at certain times will be unusable, you will have to pass the game that has several sections, which each has its own puzzles and enemies, in addition to each section overcome will become more difficult than the previous one. The sections will have secrets of the story which by joining you can understand more clearly the same, you will find radios within the sections which contain dialogues that will tell you how to solve the puzzles and some will tell you the story of the game indirectly making you have to discover the enigma that is hidden behind the story of the Afgarn mansion and its inhuman experiments.
summary: Delve into a chilling psychological horror experience, set within the confines of a sinister mansion. Solve intricate puzzles, evade twisted adversaries—partially human animatronics—and unearth the truth behind your father's vanishing act. Brace for escalating challenges at every turn.
